name: alibaba.einvoice.bill.sync
description: 电子发票业务，服务商同步结算单，包括结算单的增删改功能。最终用于开发票

subParams.name: amount
subParams.description: 价税合计，小数点后2两位

subParams.name: row_type
subParams.description: 1 折扣行 2被折扣行 0普通行

requestParams.name: status
requestParams.description: 结算单同步操作：=1插入，=2更新，=3废弃删除

requestParams.name: shop_name
requestParams.description: 店铺名称，与后台店铺名称保持一致

requestParams.name: sum_price
requestParams.description: 结算单总价格，小数点后2两位

requestParams.name: platform
requestParams.description: 调用平台，用于区分同一个税号下多个店铺来源["TB:淘宝","ALIPAY:支付宝","TM:天猫","JD:京东","DD:当当","PP:拍拍","YX:易讯","EBAY:ebay","QQ:QQ网购","AMAZON:亚马逊","SN:苏宁","GM:国美","WPH:唯品会","JM:聚美","LF:乐蜂","MGJ:蘑菇街","JS:聚尚","PX:拍鞋","YT:银泰","YHD:1号店","VANCL:凡客","YL:邮乐","YG:优购","1688:阿里巴巴","POS:POS门店","ELEME:饿了么","OTHER:其他"]

requestParams.name: qrcode
requestParams.description: 生成二维码参数，若不需要生成二维码，则不填

subParams.name: qr_type
subParams.description: 二维码返回数据类型：1=二维码背后的URL，2=二维码图片CDN URL，3=二维码二进制数据流

requestParams.name: invoice_price
requestParams.description: 结算单可开票总金额（不填=sumPrice），小数点后2两位

requestParams.name: shop_platform
requestParams.description: 开票店铺的平台，默认等于platform
